stories.text:
I need a simple App, so I go to a search engine and type "app question and answer note-taking". These are the results I got:

- The Best Note-Taking Apps For Writers (2021): A Roundup - 10 Best Note Taking Apps (With Alternatives...) - The best note-taking apps for students - 3 next-level note-taking apps that'll change the way you work

and on, and on...

Where are the actual Apps???? I don't want to read about the best, or the "10 best", or whatever generic list prepared for SEO. I want to see a list of the Apps that satisfy the criteria.

Maybe I'm doing something wrong. How do you find an App you need?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you find an App you need?
